body.name: Homemate Bed Pillows for Sleeping - Queen Size(20"x28") Set of 2 Hotel Quality Pillows Allergy Friendly Microfiber Shell Fluffy Down Alternative Filling Pillow Suitable Back Stomach or Side Sleepers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【PREMIUM FABRIC】 Microfiber fabric pillow shell, breathable and skin-friendly, moisture-wicking at night to keep cool, can be used in all seasons. Piping design, neat and beautiful cut, fine stitching, more durable and prevent filling from escaping. The microfiber is smooth and soft, and there is no abnormal noise when turning over and rubbing. Turning over at night is quieter than breathing.

【PREMIUM FILLING】Down alternative hollow fiber, soft, fluffy, strong support and strong resilience. The fiber is in a 3D helical curl structure, with stable support. The surface of each fiber is lubricated with silicone oil, which is 40% softer than ordinary fibers and not easy to agglomerate. There are tiny pores in the fiber, which can quickly absorb the sweat, effectively prevent moisture.

【SUITABLE FOR ALL SLEEPING POSITIONS】Suitable for Side, Back and Stomach sleepers. The pillow has a good balance of softness and support, providing enough support for the head and neck. The pillow fits the physiological curvature of the head and neck, which is beneficial to relieve neck pain and shoulder stiffness, and is conducive to falling asleep quickly.

【SAFETY】No harmful chemical ingredients, No formaldehyde, No heavy metals, No fluorescent, No irritation, No allergies, No peculiar smell. Ideal for sensitive groups. Before the pillow leaves the factory, it needs to be dust-removed twice, and it is vacuum-packed to prevent additional pollution during transportation, so that the pillows you receive are clean and hygienic.

【CERTIFICATION】OEKO-TEX certification. Maternal and baby-level certification. Safety and Environmental-friendly. Hotel quality. Similar pillows have sold more than 2,000,000 pieces worldwide in 2022. The factory that produces pillows has 10 years of pillow production experience and supplies pillows for 5-star hotels.

【NICE GIFT】Suitable as a gift for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Birthday, Anniversary, Christmas, Moving into a new house and other festivals. White pillows are very versatile and can be matched with various styles of bedding and suitable for various decoration styles. They are an excellent decoration for the bedroom and provide you with a 5-star hotel experience.
【MACHINE WASHABLE】The pillow is machine washable and tumble dry low for easy care. It is recommended to allow 24 hours before use to allow the pillow to return to its optimal thickness.
【AFTER-SALES SERVICE】7x24 hours after-sales service, you can contact us if you have any quality problems.
body.description: How to Prep Pillows are compress packed. For best use, prep as below: 1. Open the plastic wrap & remove the pillows. 2. Fluff the pillows vigorously and wait 24 hours. 3. Once fully loft, use the pillows as desired. How to Clean The pillows are fade resistant. For best results, clean as below: 1. Wash on a delicate cycle using cold water. 2. Dry by laying flat on a well-ventilated area. 3. Do not bleach and iron. Dry and Refresh For tumble drying, dryer setting matters a lot: 1. Always dry with no or low heat in a delicate cycle. 2. To prevent possible clumping, give your pillows a nice fluff-up after drying. 3. Air drying is recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The queen and king pillows are great.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows in a queen, and a king size, so I can stagger them with my euro pillows for my daily bed decor look. I usually have two looks for me, & my husband’s bed, which are basic white pillows, or my added throw pillows with them. I’ve been sleeping fine on these, since I have brand new ear piercings. It can be uncomfortable for ear piercings when you’re sleeping on them, when they’re fresh. These pillows gave me a lot of comfort. I would recommend these pillows. :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these pillows I will be buying more I’ve never really noticed the difference until I got these on comfort In pillows this showed me I really do love them and say they are great and price is awesome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for now
reviews.reviewText: Nice, soft and fluffy but not as full as I expected. They were vacuum packed so I'm hoping they will get fuller or somewhat firmer in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used these for bed pillows and they are great. They are so comfortable they are soft but firm it's hard to describe its like a soft pillow but once you have you head on them they hold your head in place not sinking down like some. They bounce back and retain there shape. I would recommend this to anyone who likes a softer pillow but doesn't want a hard pillow like down sometimes are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable pillows. I was skeptical as they were on the cheaper side, but very soft and comfortable. I’m a belly sleeper and have no issues. Ordering two more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are extremely soft and pretty thin. Would need to use 2 for sleeping. I wanted them to fill shams but not enough filling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packaged in tiny box
reviews.reviewText: These pillows were packaged airless which made the box so small. I thought, these couldn’t possibly be the pillows! But they were easily opening and fluffed almost immediately. They are very soft, didn’t have any packaging smell and look very luxurious. Excited for my guests to use them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We just got a king bed so had to get some new pillows naturally and these are them! Very fluffy and soft, fluffs back when you move, the breathe great. Definitely would try these out. Me and the wife love them. She is a back sleeper, and im a crazy sleeper that may wake up upside down.Great pillows might get another set
